abstract ResultSet newtonERP.orm.sgbd.AbstractSgbd.select ( AbstractOrmEntity  searchEntity,
Vector< String >  searchCriteriasParam 
) [pure virtual]

Use only for complex queries.

Use the select that takes only a vector of entities instead

Method used to do search queries done from the views to the databse. The search criterias that has been passed in parameter are a list of string that has been generated by the view modules

Parameters:
searchEntity the entity that has to be researched
searchCriteriasParam the search criterias formatted into strings
Returns:
a vector of ormizable entities

Implemented in newtonERP.orm.sgbd.sqlite.SgbdSqlite.

abstract ResultSet newtonERP.orm.sgbd.AbstractSgbd.select ( AbstractOrmEntity  searchEntity,
Vector< String >  searchCriteriasParam,
int  limit,
int  offset,
String  orderBy 
) [pure virtual]

Use only for complex queries.

Use the select that takes only a vector of entities instead

Method used to do search queries done from the views to the databse. The search criterias that has been passed in parameter are a list of string that has been generated by the view modules

Parameters:
searchEntity the entity that has to be researched
searchCriteriasParam the search criterias formatted into strings
limit limite de résultat
offset offset du début des résultats
orderBy ordre facultatif
Returns:
a vector of ormizable entities
